timeline.message: Map Count with HotRestart enabled and atleast one index

timeline.bodyText: I can't see where is the index added.
timeline.author: erosb

timeline.bodyText: This isn't an index. It is a map entry.
timeline.author: erosb

timeline.bodyText: This counts the non-empty maps, not the maps with indexes. Please refer to the reference manual about indexing: https://docs.hazelcast.org/docs/latest-dev/manual/html-single/#indexing-queries
timeline.author: erosb
